channel.title: Solar energy on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in Solar energy on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Renewable Energy Corporation Logo
The Renewable Energy Corporation is a solar power company with headquarters in Singapore. REC produces silicon materials for photovoltaics applications and multicrystalline wafers, as well as solar cells and modules. All of REC’s solar cell and wafer production plants in Norway were shut down permanently in 2011 and 2012 due to weak market conditions and prospects of significant negative cash flow. The parent company of REC is ChemChina, one of the largest chemical companies and state-owned by the People’s Republic of China, which has held its stake in Elkem since 2015 through the China National Bluestar Group.
You can download theREClogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: REC
item.description: The Renewable Energy Corporation is a solar power company with headquarters in Singapore. REC produces silicon materials for photovoltaics applications and multicrystalline wafers, as well as solar cells and modules. All of REC’s solar cell and wafer production plants in Norway were shut down permanently in 2011 and 2012 due to weak market conditions and prospects of significant negative cash flow. The parent company of REC is ChemChina, one of the largest chemical companies and state-owned by the People’s Republic of China, which has held its stake in Elkem since 2015 through the China National Bluestar Group.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
SolarCity Logo
SolarCity Corporation was a publicly traded company headquartered in Fremont, California that sold and installed solar energy generation systems as well as other related products and services to residential, commercial and industrial customers. The company was founded on July 4, 2006, by Peter and Lyndon Rive, the cousins of Tesla, Inc. CEO Elon Musk. Telsa acquired SolarCity in 2016, at a cost of approximately $2.6 billion and reorganized its solar business into Tesla Energy.
You can download theSolarCitylogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: SolarCity
item.description: SolarCity Corporation was a publicly traded company headquartered in Fremont, California that sold and installed solar energy generation systems as well as other related products and services to residential, commercial and industrial customers. The company was founded on July 4, 2006, by Peter and Lyndon Rive, the cousins of Tesla, Inc. CEO Elon Musk. Telsa acquired SolarCity in 2016, at a cost of approximately $2.6 billion and reorganized its solar business into Tesla Energy.
